segments.text: How do I know if I qualify for unemployment benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you working fewer hours than you used to work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You usually qualify if you got laid off or are working a lot fewer hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most jobs provide unemployment , but some don â€™ t .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that my job pays unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can call your unemployment office , and they can check for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I be able to collect a lot of money on unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a formula to determine the amount based on how much you earned . They will let you know when you file your claim .
segments.speaker: S2
